name: Association Belge des Consommateurs Test-Achats / Belgische Verbruikersunie Test Aankoop
goal: As a consumer organisation our goal is to inform, help and defend consumers in all their 'consumer activities'. We do this by providing them all information they need, by helping them in conflicts with businesses and service providers, by launching legal (class) actions, by representing them in advisory boards and commissions,  and by lobbying decision makers at all levels (regional, national, European, â€¦)
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Food Safety, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market, Telecom, Energy, Data protection, Internet of Things, Financial services, Food (labeling, novel foods, nutrition, additives), Health (Drugs, medical devices, transparency clinical surveys, E-health), Consumer rights,
Circular economy, International trade, REFIT consumer acquis, competition,...
